channel.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
channel.description:
Ok well first of all, if this is not allowed, please get rid of this post
Ok, well i am trying to hack onto my school computers to change one of my school marks, but i have barely any experience at hacking, my school has a firewall from http://www.netsentron.com/ , my schools website is http://www.meisoc.com/ (lmfao gay!!) the ip for the website is 70.69.160.164 right now i don't have any info on the firewalls ip, or the school computers ip's cuz i am at home.
most of the computers are running windows nt, a few are xp, and they are using vexira
i have a MD5 Brute Force Cracker, some sniffers, keyloggers, and a filebinder
Thanks :)

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
item.dc:creator: @Infinate .Infinate
item.description:
@Infinate wrote:

Tbh I got excluded for a week for fucking up the school website and using netsend.

You have fucked it if / when you get caught

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

avistetto:

lol you wont get expelled if you put 5+ random peoples marks up then if they do notice you say you have no idea of what happend and you will be as innocent as the other 5 people

I hope you were joking. Of course they can, and will track you down.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)

item.description:
@shawnvwd wrote:

yeah i know, but i was doing really bad in it around the first 3/4 of the term, but now ive been getting 100% on all of the latest things

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
item.dc:creator: @existingqwer existingqwer
item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:

Chances are that you wont succeed in doing this, and if you get caught you’re in big trouble. Spanish isn’t that hard, it’s easy to study. Just learn the vocabulary well and memorize the verb forms and you’ll do ok. That’s easier than trying to figure out how to hack the school computers.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
item.dc:creator: @shawnvwd shawnvwd
item.description:
@shawnvwd wrote:

ahh im not gonna hack my school board, i just wanna get my spanish mark up, cuz all of my marks are 75% + exept my spanish is only 60%, even though im trying now, i just wanna raise it up before report cards, i know that my teachers use ms exel for all of the marks

Read full topic

item.title: Hacking my school computer's ;)
item.dc:creator: @serpento serpento
item.description:
@serpento wrote:

[b]BTW: If its a public school, then the school board has there own student info database. The schools website isn’t gonna get you anywhere from moving up you’re grades.

Sorry, but I would like to hear if you hacked the school board ;)[/b]

Read full topic
